physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Stamped on back of photograph: ''Jewish News, jack j. goldman; commercial photography; 1223 holly st. de. 3-0673; denver 20, colorado.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Seder - 1964; J. C. C.; #1117; Council of Jewish Women Sponsoring model Seder for the senior citizen group. Mrs. E. Tannenbaum is chairman for council (senior citizen group. Mr. Salomon Mendelsohn is leading the model Seder and giving short explanations.

mods.abstract: Several unidentified older men and women sit at tables during a model Seder sponsored by the Denver Section of the Council of Jewish Women. Mr. Salomon Mendelsohn stands at the head table and holds a glass and a book. Mendelsohn leads the Seder and provides explanations to the guests.

name.namePart: National Council of Jewish Women.--Denver Section
